description: Captures the VM by copying virtual hard disks of the VM and outputs a template that can be used to create similar VMs.

subscription_id.description: Subscription credentials which uniquely identify Microsoft Azure subscription. The subscription ID forms part of the URI for every service call.

vhdprefix.description: The captured virtual hard disk's name prefix.

overwritevhds.description: Specifies whether to overwrite the destination virtual hard disk, in case of conflict.

resource_group_name.description: The name of the resource group.

vm_name.description: The name of the virtual machine.

parameters.description: Parameters supplied to the Capture Virtual Machine operation.
